abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights apps for help with Thanksgiving shopping, cooking and other activities.
lead_paragraph: A selection of apps to make your Thanksgiving go as smoothly as possible, from the preparation of a shopping list to after-dinner diversions.

headline.main: Video Feature: Apps to Streamline Thanksgiving at Every Step of the Process
headline.print_headline: From Shopping Help to Entertainment, Apps to Be Thankful For

snippet: A selection of apps to make your Thanksgiving go as smoothly as possible, from the preparation of a shopping list to after-dinner diversions.
